          <title>
            <string language="en">Electrolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Électrolyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Electrolysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettrolisi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρόλυση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Electrólisis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the setup for electrolysis using carbon electrodes for the extraction of metals from their ores.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrochemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electrolysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">extraction</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Installation für 
Elektrolyse mit Carbonelektroden für die Extraktion der Metalle von 
ihren Erzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour 
l'électrolyse à l'aide des électrodes de carbone pour l'extraction 
des métaux de leurs minerais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a instalação para o 
electrolysis usando os elétrodos do carbono para a extração dos 
metais de seus minérios.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto per 
elettrolisi per mezzo degli elettrodi del carbonio per l'estrazione 
dei metalli dai loro minerali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την οργάνωση για την 
ηλεκτρόλυση χρησιμοποιώντας τα ηλεκτρόδια άνθρακα για την εξαγωγή
των μετάλλων από τα μεταλλεύματά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la disposición para la
electrólisis usando los electrodos del carbón para la extracción de
metales de sus minerales.</string>
          </description>
